Class ProjectFilter

Object
ProjectFilter
public class ProjectFilter extends Object
Provides filtering and sorting functionality for BTO projects. This class enables users to filter BTO projects based on various criteria such as project name, neighborhood, flat type, and visibility. It also allows sorting projects in different orders. The filter settings can be customized and applied to any list of BTOProject objects to get a filtered and sorted result set.
Version:
1.0
Author:
BTOMS Team

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectFilter

      public ProjectFilter()
      Constructs a new ProjectFilter with default settings. Default settings: sort by name ascending, show visible projects only, and no specific filters for name, neighborhood, or flat type.

  • Method Details

    • applyFilter

      public List<BTOProject> applyFilter(List<BTOProject> projects)
      Applies the current filter settings to a list of BTO projects.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of BTO projects to filter and sort
      Returns:
      A new list containing only the projects that match the filter criteria, sorted according to the current sort order

    • getComparator

      private Comparator<BTOProject> getComparator()
      Gets the appropriate comparator based on the current sort order.
      Returns:
      A Comparator for sorting BTO projects according to the current sort order

    • getSortOrder

      public ProjectFilter.ProjectSortOrder getSortOrder()
      Gets the current sort order.
      Returns:
      The current sort order setting

    • setSortOrder

      public void setSortOrder(ProjectFilter.ProjectSortOrder sortOrder)
      Sets the sort order for projects.
      Parameters:
      sortOrder - The new sort order to use

    • getNameFilter

      public String getNameFilter()
      Gets the current name filter.
      Returns:
      The project name filter string, or null if not set

    • setNameFilter

      public void setNameFilter(String nameFilter)
      Sets the project name filter.
      Parameters:
      nameFilter - The project name substring to filter by, or null to clear this filter

    • getNeighborhoodFilter

      public String getNeighborhoodFilter()
      Gets the current neighborhood filter.
      Returns:
      The neighborhood filter string, or null if not set

    • setNeighborhoodFilter

      public void setNeighborhoodFilter(String neighborhoodFilter)
      Sets the neighborhood filter.
      Parameters:
      neighborhoodFilter - The neighborhood substring to filter by, or null to clear this filter

    • getFlatTypeFilter

      public FlatType getFlatTypeFilter()
      Gets the current flat type filter.
      Returns:
      The flat type filter, or null if not set

    • setFlatTypeFilter

      public void setFlatTypeFilter(FlatType flatTypeFilter)
      Sets the flat type filter.
      Parameters:
      flatTypeFilter - The flat type to filter by, or null to clear this filter

    • isShowVisibleOnly

      public boolean isShowVisibleOnly()
      Checks if the filter is set to show only visible projects.
      Returns:
      true if only visible projects will be shown, false otherwise

    • setShowVisibleOnly

      public void setShowVisibleOnly(boolean showVisibleOnly)
      Sets whether to show only visible projects.
      Parameters:
      showVisibleOnly - true to show only visible projects, false to show all projects

    • resetFilters

      public void resetFilters()
      Resets all filters to their default settings. Default settings: sort by name ascending, show visible projects only, and no specific filters for name, neighborhood, or flat type.
